me_no_target: No such person around; your prayers vanish into the endless voids.
actor_room: $n begs and grovels to the powers that be.
me_room: You feel righteous, and maybe a little foolish.
actor_self: $n performs some strange yoga-exercises and mumbles a prayer to $mself.
actor_other: $n falls down and grovels in the dirt before $N.
actor_me: $n kisses the dirt at your feet.
me_actor: You crawl in the dust before $M.
